name: Kill Your Darlings (applecore555)
description:
Move through the haunted forest to find stranded humans, will you save them or be their doom?  

Keyboard Controls:

  • WASD to move and aim
  • Space to jump (hold for higher jump)
  • Shift to dash in aimed direction (refreshes when touching ground or landing a down-air attack)
  • J for quick attack (aim in the air with WASD)
  • K for wide attack
  • Q/E to interact with humans (Q to save them, E to eat them)
  • ESC to pause
  • Mouse to navigate menus

Xbox Controls:

  • Left Stick to move and aim
  • A to jump (hold for higher jump)
  • Left Bumper to dash in aimed direction
  • Right Bumper for quick attack
  • Right Trigger for wide attack
  • X/Y to interact with humans (Y to save them, X to eat them)
  • START to pause
  • Mouse to navigate menus

There are 3 levels, see how many people you can save by the end... if you can make it to the end alive...
